DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare overall subjective comfort profile 8 hour lens wear two group habitual soft contact lens wearer ( frequent replacement daily disposable hydrogel lens ) refit Clariti 1-Day .
DOC.brief_title: Overall Performance 1-day Silicone Hydrogel Lens When Habitual Soft Lens Wearers Are Refit
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single day , randomize , double-masked , non-dispensing , contralateral study .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : 1 . Is least 17 year age full legal capacity volunteer ; 2 . Has read sign information consent letter ; 3 . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; 4 . Is correctable visual acuity 20/40 better ( eye ) habitual correction assign study lens ; 5 . Habitually wear either 1Day Acuvue® Moist® frequent replacement contact lens ( defined 4.1.1 ) ; 6 . Habitually wear contact lenses power 1.00 6.00D ( inclusive ) eye ; 7 . Demonstrates acceptable fit study lenses ; 8 . Is usually able wear contact lenses least 8 hour per day . A person exclude study he/she : 1 . Is participate concurrent clinical research study ; 2 . Has know active* ocular disease and/or infection ; 3 . Has systemic condition opinion investigator may affect study outcome variable ; 4 . Is use systemic topical medication opinion investigator may affect study outcome variable ; 5 . Has know sensitivity diagnostic substance ( pharmaceutical ) , fluorescein dye , product use study ; 6 . Is aphakic ; 7 . Has undergone refractive error surgery . 8 . Has participate previous BEETHOVEN study ( ORE # 20893 ) For purpose study , active ocular disease define infection inflammation require therapeutic treatment . Mild ( i.e . consider clinically relevant ) lid abnormality ( blepharitis , meibomian gland dysfunction , papilla ) , corneal conjunctival stain dry eye consider active ocular disease . Neovascularization corneal scar result previous hypoxia , infection inflammation therefore active .
